snippet: As the planet changes, saving nature is not so simple anymore.
abstract: Op-Ed article by author Emma Marris and scientist Greg Aplet notes schism exists between 'old conservationists' who favor wilderness protection and maintaining old ecosystems and 'new conservationists' who favor more interventionist approach to protecting environment; holds combined approach is smartest strategy; says complicated picture and great uncertainty brought on by increased human impact on environment necessitates multi-pronged scheme.

byline.original: By EMMA MARRIS and GREG APLET

lead_paragraph: As the planet changes, saving nature is not so simple anymore.

headline.main: How to Mend the Conservation Divide
headline.print_headline: How to Mend the Conservation Divide
